title: Reaction Time
instruction: When the red box turns green, click as quickly as you can. Click anywhere to start.

title: Sequence Memory
description: Remember and increasingly long pattern of button presses.
instruction: Memorize the pattern and click sequentially.

title: Aim Trainer
description: How quickly can you hit all targets?
instruction: Hit the targets as quickly as you can. Click anywhere to start.

title: Number Memory
description: Remember the longest number you can.
instruction: The average person can remember 7 numbers at once. Can you do more?

title: Verbal Memory
description: Keep as many words in short term memory as possible.
instruction: You will be shown words, one at a time. I you've seen a word during the test, click SEEN, if it's a new word, click NEW.

title: Chimp Test
description: Are you smarter than a chimpanzee?
instruction: Click the squares in order according to their numbers.

title: Visual Memory
description: Remember an increasingly large broad of squares.

title: Typing
description: How many words per minute can you write?
instruction: Type the words exactly as written. Click anywhere to start.
